(Simplified: 玮)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 韋 indicates the sound; 王 (jade) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 王 [ wáng ] king, ruler; royal; surname
    • 韋 [ wéi ] tanned leather; surname
①玉名。
②美好。
③珍奇，貴重：琦瑋。瑋奇。
④珍愛，珍視。

瑋字的基本解释

瑋
wěi
见“玮”。

瑋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》于鬼切，上尾，云。］
“玮1”的繁体字。
(1)玉名。
(2)美好的；珍奇的。参见“瑋態”。
(3)称美；珍视。
(4)通“韋”。熟兽皮。

瑋字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑋； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页737第05
【廣韻】于鬼切【集韻】【韻會】羽鬼切，?音韙。【廣韻】玉名。　又【博雅】瑋，重也。【又】瑰瑋，琦玩也。　又人名。【前漢·王子侯表】就鄕節侯瑋。　又【集韻】紆胃切，音尉。瑰瑋，亦讀上聲。　又【韻補】叶于貴切，音位。【張華·鷦鷯賦】提挈萬里，飄颻逼畏。體大妨物，形瓌足瑋。 考證：〔【張華·鷦鷯賦】提絜萬里，飄颻逼畏。〕　謹照原文絜改挈。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" Yu Guiqie, Shangwei, Yun. ]
Traditional characters of "玮1".
(1) Jade name.
(2) Beautiful; rare. See "Wei State".
(3) Call beauty; cherish.
(4) Through "Wei". Cooked animal skins.
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　wei; Kangxi strokes: 14; page number: page 737 05
[Guangyun] Yu Guiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yuguiqie,? Yin Yun. [Guang Yun] Yu name.　[Bo Ya] Wei, Chong Ye. [Also] Guiwei, Qi has fun.　Another name. 【Former Han·Prince Hou Biao】On the festival Hou Wei.　 [Ji Yun] Stomach cut, Yin Wei. Guiwei, also read on the sound.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Yugui cut, phoneme. 【Zhang Hua·Wren's Fu】Thousands of miles, fluttering in fear. The body is big, and the foot is Wei-shaped. Textual research: 〔【Zhang Hua·Wren Fu】Takes thousands of miles away and is fearful. 〕　I would like to change it according to the original text.
